description:
Kenshiro and Yasaka`s battle is interrupted by the Chinese army`s attack. Kenshiro follows Yasaka across the ocean to Ningpo, and they meet again at the North Star family temple. With the force of a two thousand year grudge, Yasaka destroys the Divine Fist of the North Star successors` Tower of Souls, prompting a brightly glowing jewel to appear. Enveloped in the blinding glow of the jewel, Yasaka and Kenshiro learn the sad and violent truth of the North Star and West Dipper.
"Why..."
What was the West Dipper that the stunned Yasaka saw in the light...?
Source: crunchyroll
